sn12.66:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kurusu viharati kammasadhammam nama kurunam nigamo.
sn12.66:1.8: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.66:1.10: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, sammasasi antaram sammasan”ti?
sn12.66:1.12: Yatha so bhikkhu byakasi na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittam aradhesi.
sn12.66:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.66:2.3: yam bhagava antaram sammasam bhaseyya. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn12.66:2.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn12.66:3.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammasamano sammasati antaram sammasam:
sn12.66:3.2: ‘yam kho idam anekavidham nanappakarakam dukkham loke uppajjati jaramaranam.
sn12.66:3.3: Idam kho dukkham kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam, kismim sati jaramaranam hoti, kismim asati jaramaranam na hoti’ti?
sn12.66:3.5: ‘yam kho idam anekavidham nanappakarakam dukkham loke uppajjati jaramaranam.
sn12.66:3.6: Idam kho dukkham upadhinidanam upadhisamudayam upadhijatikam upadhipabhavam, upadhismim sati jaramaranam hoti, upadhismim asati jaramaranam na hoti’ti.
sn12.66:3.7: So jaramarananca pajanati jaramaranasamudayanca pajanati jaramarananirodhanca pajanati ya ca jaramarananirodhasaruppagamini patipada tanca pajanati.
sn12.66:3.9: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya patipanno jaramarananirodhaya.
sn12.66:4.2: ‘upadhi panayam kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo, kismim sati upadhi hoti, kismim asati upadhi na hoti’ti?
sn12.66:4.4: ‘upadhi tanhanidano tanhasamudayo tanhajatiko tanhapabhavo, tanhaya sati upadhi hoti, tanhaya asati upadhi na hoti’ti.
sn12.66:4.5: So upadhinca pajanati upadhisamudayanca pajanati upadhinirodhanca pajanati ya ca upadhinirodhasaruppagamini patipada tanca pajanati.
sn12.66:4.7: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya patipanno upadhinirodhaya.
sn12.66:5.2: ‘tanha panayam kattha uppajjamana uppajjati, kattha nivisamana nivisati’ti?
sn12.66:5.4: yam kho loke piyarupam satarupam etthesa tanha uppajjamana uppajjati, ettha nivisamana nivisati.
sn12.66:5.6: Cakkhum loke piyarupam, satarupam, etthesa tanha uppajjamana uppajjati, ettha nivisamana nivisati.
sn12.66:5.11: mano loke piyarupam satarupam, etthesa tanha uppajjamana uppajjati ettha nivisamana nivisati.
sn12.66:6.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam niccato addakkhum sukhato addakkhum attato addakkhum arogyato addakkhum khemato addakkhum.
sn12.66:6.3: Ye tanham vaddhesum te upadhim vaddhesum.
sn12.66:6.4: Ye upadhim vaddhesum te dukkham vaddhesum.
sn12.66:6.5: Ye dukkham vaddhesum te na parimuccimsu jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccimsu dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:7.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam niccato dakkhissanti sukhato dakkhissanti attato dakkhissanti arogyato dakkhissanti khemato dakkhissanti.
sn12.66:7.3: Ye tanham vaddhissanti te upadhim vaddhissanti.
sn12.66:7.4: Ye upadhim vaddhissanti te dukkham vaddhissanti.
sn12.66:7.5: Ye dukkham vaddhissanti te na parimuccissanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccissanti dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:8.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti arogyato passanti khemato passanti.
sn12.66:8.3: Ye tanham vaddhenti te upadhim vaddhenti.
sn12.66:8.4: Ye upadhim vaddhenti te dukkham vaddhenti.
sn12.66:8.5: Ye dukkham vaddhenti te na parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccanti dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:9.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, apaniyakamso vannasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
sn12.66:9.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito.
sn12.66:9.5: ‘ayam te, ambho purisa, apaniyakamso vannasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno;
sn12.66:9.8: Pivato hi kho tam chadessati vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana tatonidanam maranam va nigacchasi maranamattam va dukkhan’ti.
sn12.66:9.9: So tam apaniyakamsam sahasa appatisankha piveyya, nappatinissajjeyya.
sn12.66:9.10: So tatonidanam maranam va nigaccheyya maranamattam va dukkham.
sn12.66:9.11: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam …pe…
sn12.66:9.13: etarahi samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti arogyato passanti khemato passanti, te tanham vaddhenti.
sn12.66:9.14: Ye tanham vaddhenti te upadhim vaddhenti.
sn12.66:9.15: Ye upadhim vaddhenti te dukkham vaddhenti.
sn12.66:9.16: Ye dukkham vaddhenti te na parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccanti dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:10.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam aniccato addakkhum dukkhato addakkhum anattato addakkhum rogato addakkhum bhayato addakkhum,
sn12.66:10.3: Ye tanham pajahimsu te upadhim pajahimsu.
sn12.66:10.4: Ye upadhim pajahimsu te dukkham pajahimsu.
sn12.66:10.5: Ye dukkham pajahimsu te parimuccimsu jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, parimuccimsu dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:11.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti,
sn12.66:12.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti,
sn12.66:12.3: Ye tanham pajahanti te upadhim pajahanti.
sn12.66:12.4: Ye upadhim pajahanti te dukkham pajahanti.
sn12.66:12.5: Ye dukkham pajahanti te parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, parimuccanti dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:13.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, apaniyakamso vannasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
sn12.66:13.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito.
sn12.66:13.5: ‘ayam te, ambho purisa, apaniyakamso vannasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno
sn12.66:13.8: Pivato hi kho tam chadessati vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi; pivitva ca pana tatonidanam maranam va nigacchasi maranamattam va dukkhan’ti.
sn12.66:13.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evamassa:
sn12.66:13.10: ‘sakka kho me ayam surapipasita paniyena va vinetum dadhimandakena va vinetum bhatthalonikaya va vinetum lonasovirakena va vinetum, na tvevaham tam piveyyam, yam mama assa digharattam hitaya sukhaya’ti.
sn12.66:13.11: So tam apaniyakamsam patisankha na piveyya, patinissajjeyya.
sn12.66:13.12: So tatonidanam na maranam va nigaccheyya maranamattam va dukkham.
sn12.66:13.13: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam aniccato addakkhum dukkhato addakkhum anattato addakkhum rogato addakkhum bhayato addakkhum,
sn12.66:13.15: Ye tanham pajahimsu te upadhim pajahimsu.
sn12.66:13.16: Ye upadhim pajahimsu te dukkham pajahimsu.
sn12.66:13.17: Ye dukkham pajahimsu te parimuccimsu jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, parimuccimsu dukkhasmati vadami.
sn12.66:14.2: etarahi samana va brahmana va yam loke piyarupam satarupam tam aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti,
sn12.66:14.4: Ye tanham pajahanti te upadhim pajahanti.
sn12.66:14.5: Ye upadhim pajahanti te dukkham pajahanti.
sn12.66:14.6: Ye dukkham pajahanti te parimuccanti jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, parimuccanti dukkhasmati vadami”ti.
